name: Generation Zero: Motorbikes Pack
summary: You can now travel through Östertörn on new types of Motorbikes! It’s faster. It’s louder. It’s more exciting! The motorbikes will get you places quicker, but they’ll need fuel to drive. Plan your travel strategically so you won't run out of gasoline unexpectedly, and be sure to check out abandoned cars and gas stations and find jerry cans to fuel up. Or craft the fuel by yourself! You can ride on 3 different models. Each of them has their own strengths and weaknesses.
